Body:
""" wedge, chi = 0 """
SANITY = False
om = np.zeros(self.np, np.float)
g_old = transform.compute_g_vectors(self.tth, self.eta, om, self.wvln,
    wedge=0.0, chi=0.0)
if SANITY:
    print(g_old.shape, g_old[:, (0)])
k = transform.compute_k_vectors(self.tth, self.eta, self.wvln)
if SANITY:
    print('k=', k[:, (0)])
g_new = gv_general.k_to_g(k, om)
if SANITY:
    print(g_new.shape, g_new[:, (0)])
if SANITY:
    print('end routine')
self.assertAlmostEqual(array_diff(g_new, g_old), 0, 6)
